nodes.documentation:
@title MPLTokensalePlan
@dev MPLTokensalePlan contract
Handle the sale plan
The step always evolve forward
 * @author Cyril Lapinte - <cyril.lapinte@mtpelerin.com>
 * Error messages
E01: Not the current step
E02: Interval ends before it start
E03: Current step is before
E04: Current step is after
E05: A plan already exists
E06: Steps are defined in wrong order
nodes.name: MPLTokensalePlan

nodes.documentation: @dev getter need to be declared to comply with IMPLTokensale interface
nodes.name: saleConfig

nodes.documentation: @dev define the plan for the tokensale*
nodes.name: plan

nodes.documentation: @dev allow an adjustment of the starting date*
nodes.name: updateSaleOpeningTime
evalNewStep
